   - Row 10: Game 13, Date November 21, Location Attendance "pepsi center 19359"
   - Row 11: Game 14, Date November 24, Location Attendance "pepsi center 16307"

   - However, only 4 games were played at the Pepsi Center, and all of them were wins.

### Conclusion:
